/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional yellow and red accents that add a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the foreground, power lines crisscross, adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. Cars and trucks can be seen on the road, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
